selected_quotes: To facilitate learning a foreign language, try singing (new study
Do you sing or play an instrument? Helps when learning a language.
I'm reading Singing can facilitate foreign language learning #springerlink
A listen and sing learning method can help you learn a foreign language - #language #listen-and-sing
Proof of what any ESOL teacher already knew - adults learn new language more effectively when they sing the words.

citation.abstract: This study presents the first experimental evidence that singing can facilitate short-term paired-associate phrase learning in an unfamiliar language (Hungarian). Sixty adult participants were randomly assigned to one of three "listen-and-repeat" learning conditions: speaking, rhythmic speaking, or singing. Participants in the singing condition showed superior overall performance on a collection of Hungarian language tests after a 15-min learning period, as compared with participants in the speaking and rhythmic speaking conditions. This superior performance was statistically significant (p < .05) for the two tests that required participants to recall and produce spoken Hungarian phrases. The differences in performance were not explained by potentially influencing factors such as age, gender, mood, phonological working memory ability, or musical ability and training. These results suggest that a "listen-and-sing" learning method can facilitate verbatim memory for spoken foreign language phrases.
citation.title: Singing can facilitate foreign language learning

다른 나라를 제대로 경험하고, 이해하는 첫 관문이 바로 언어가 아닐까요? 
넓은 세상이 너무나 가까워진 시대 속에, 외국어를 잘하기 위한 방법은 많은 분들의 관심사일 것 같네요! 

저널 ‘Memory & Cognition’에서 바로, 노래하기! 가 반복해서 읽기보다 더 효과가 좋다는 연구 결과 ‘Singing can facilitate foreign language learning’ 가 나왔습니다.
